name: Murphie_DEMO2
description:
THIS IS A DEMO

Hello! And welcome! This is the first game I ever make! 

You wake up, and you have no idea where you are, or who even are you.

 You're confused, perhaps there might be someone around to help?

INSTAGRAM: @murphie_whinstockk

SPECIAL THANKS TO SEBASTIAN CONTRERAS WHO HELPED ME WITH THIS PROJECT!!! (Instagram: @sedac_c please follow him, he is very sweet and helped me a lot)

If it gets some followers, I might continue it.

Enjoy! -Chase Miller
